suncertify.db
Class Data

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.db.DBDataModel

          suncertify.db.Data
All Implemented Interfaces:
DB, URLyBirdDataManager
public class Data
extends DatabaseManager
implements DB

This is the Data file required to manage/implement DB interface of the specification given which handles the various manipulation of the database record

Author:
Segun

public java.lang.String[] read(int recNo)
                        throws RecordNotFoundException
Description copied from interface: DB
Reads a record from the file. Returns an array where each element is a record value.

Specified by:
read in interface DB
Parameters:
recNo - - position of the data to be read in the record/database

- an array where each element is a record value
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - - if data was previously deleted in the record or doesn't exist

update

public void update(int recNo,
                   java.lang.String[] d,
                   long lockCookie)
            throws RecordNotFoundException,
                   java.lang.SecurityException
Description copied from interface: DB
Modifies the fields of a record. The new value for field n appears in data[n]. Throws SecurityException if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie.

Specified by:
update in interface DB
Parameters:
recNo - - position of the data to be updated in the record/database
d - - New array of string value to be replaced with the old record
lockCookie - - a long value to identify the thread thats holding a lock on the data at this recNo
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - - if data was previously deleted in the record or doesn't exist
java.lang.SecurityException - - if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie passed into the parameter

                   long lockCookie)
            throws RecordNotFoundException,
                   java.lang.SecurityException
Description copied from interface: DB
Deletes a record, making the record number and associated disk storage available for reuse. Throws SecurityException if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie.

Specified by:
delete in interface DB
Parameters:
recNo - - position of the data to be deleted from the record/database
lockCookie - - a long value to identify the thread thats holding a lock on the data at this recNo
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - - if data was previously deleted in the record or doesn't exist
java.lang.SecurityException - - if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie passed into the parameter

find

public int[] find(java.lang.String[] criteria)
Description copied from interface: DB
Returns an array of record numbers that match the specified criteria. Field n in the database file is described by criteria[n]. A null value in criteria[n] matches any field value. A non-null value in criteria[n] matches any field value that begins with criteria[n]. (For example, "Fred" matches "Fred" or "Freddy".)

Specified by:
find in interface DB
Parameters:
criteria - - array of string which each element denotes the value to match with the unique fields used in data matching
Returns:
- an array of record numbers that matches the given criteria

create

public int create(java.lang.String[] d)
           throws DuplicateKeyException
Description copied from interface: DB
Creates a new record in the database (possibly reusing a deleted entry). Inserts the given data, and returns the record number of the new record.

Specified by:
create in interface DB
Parameters:
d - - array of string value to be recorded into the database possibly reusing a deleted entry flagged 1
Returns:
- the record number of this new data thats added
Throws:
DuplicateKeyException - - if data argument unique key exists in the database

lock

public long lock(int recNo)
          throws RecordNotFoundException
Description copied from interface: DB
Locks a record so that it can only be updated or deleted by this client. Returned value is a cookie that must be used when the record is unlocked, updated, or deleted. If the specified record is already locked by a different client, the current thread gives up the CPU and consumes no CPU cycles until the record is unlocked.

Specified by:
lock in interface DB
Parameters:
recNo - - position of the data to be locked in the record/database
Returns:
- a random long value that serves as the thread identification for locking the data in the record
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - - if data was previously deleted in the record or doesn't exist

unlock

public void unlock(int recNo,
                   long cookie)
            throws RecordNotFoundException,
                   java.lang.SecurityException
Description copied from interface: DB
Releases the lock on a record. Cookie must be the cookie returned when the record was locked, otherwise throws SecurityException.

Specified by:
unlock in interface DB
Parameters:
recNo - - position of the data to be unlocked in the record/database
cookie - - a long value this thread holds identifying it as the one that locked the data in the record
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - - if data was previously deleted in the record or doesn't exist
java.lang.SecurityException - - if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie passed into the parameter
